item.title: CNC Foam Cutting
item.content: High-precision computer-controlled cutting for complex shapes and internal cavities. Ideal for high-volume production with consistent quality.

item.title: Water-jet Fabrication
item.content: Cold cutting technology that ensures no heat-affected zones. Perfect for sensitive materials and thick foam blocks up to 200mm.

item.title: Foam Prototyping
item.content: Rapid prototyping service for design validation. Get a physical sample of your foam insert within 48 hours for testing.
